lead_paragraph: This tomato gazpacho is a fresh-tasting, exceptionally light soup, whose ingredients sound odd at first, but combine beautifully. It has lemon-flavored Perrier, and for a topping, a dollop of whipped cream just barely flavored with vanilla bean.
snippet: This tomato gazpacho is a fresh tasting, exceptionally light soup, whose ingredients sound odd at first, but combine beautifully.

headline.main: The Temporary Vegetarian: Tomato Gazpacho With Vanilla Cream

abstract: This tomato gazpacho is a fresh tasting, exceptionally light soup, whose ingredients sound odd at first, but combine beautifully.
